project.name: Test_Sample_Project
project.description: Sample Jama project for testing notification fixes

requirements.name: System Power Requirements
requirements.description: The system shall operate within a power consumption range of 100-250W under normal operating conditions. Power management features shall automatically reduce consumption during idle periods.

requirements.name: Temperature Operating Range
requirements.description: The system shall operate reliably within an ambient temperature range of -10°C to +60°C. Temperature monitoring shall provide alerts when approaching operational limits.

requirements.name: User Interface Responsiveness
requirements.description: The user interface shall respond to user inputs within 200ms under normal system load conditions. Visual feedback shall be provided for all user interactions.

requirements.name: Data Encryption Standards
requirements.description: All sensitive data transmission shall use AES-256 encryption with TLS 1.3 or higher. Encryption keys shall be rotated every 90 days automatically.

requirements.name: System Backup Requirements
requirements.description: The system shall perform automated backups of all configuration data and user settings every 24 hours. Backup data shall be retained for a minimum of 30 days.

requirements.name: Network Connectivity Requirements
requirements.description: The system shall maintain network connectivity through Ethernet (1 Gbps) and wireless (802.11ac) interfaces. Automatic failover between interfaces shall occur within 5 seconds.

requirements.name: Error Logging and Diagnostics
requirements.description: The system shall log all error conditions with timestamp, severity level, and contextual information. Diagnostic data shall be accessible through both GUI and API interfaces.

requirements.name: System Startup Time
requirements.description: The system shall complete full initialization and be ready for operation within 30 seconds of power-on. Progress indicators shall inform users of startup status.
